title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: Open the application and go to the layout view. Import an image file called 'image1.jpg' into the layout. Then, delete 'image1.jpg' from the outline image. Next, rename another image file as 'image1.jpg'.
EB: After performing the steps mentioned in the OB section, observe that the newly imported image file named 'image1.jpg' is not refreshed and remains unchanged in the layout view.
SR: Ensure that when an image file is imported again with the same name after being deleted and replaced with another file, the image is refreshed and displayed correctly in the layout view.
